data.title: Täubchen, das entflattert ist... Da schreibt meine Schwester Ida
data.description: Alfred sings a short aria, from outside the stage, trying to serenade Rosalinde. What he doesn't know, is that Rosalinde isn't the one listening, it is Adele. Adele then sings an aria and tells him off, while making a fool out of him
